text:
*Approvals for Deal Pipelines BETA*
Hi there,
I have somme issues and remarks about this new and awesome beta.
Anybody from the team I can share with?
I used the support in the UI but didn't go through I think.

Having ticketing directly on the doc of the beta would be helpful
<https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/object-settings/pipeline-approvals>
Reminder: *Want to learn the latest tips and tricks for building on HubSpot?*  Check out our <https://developers.HubSpot.com/blog|Developer blog> for the latest.

• Be able to use a user field for approvers
• Be able to insert a property mandatory to fill by approver for rejection rather than only a comment
Will make sure the team sees this :face_with_cowboy_hat:
